metadata.title: CVE-2024-42118 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/amd/display: Do not return negative stream id for array[WHY]resource_stream_to_stream_idx returns an array index and it return -1when not found; however, -1 is not a valid array index number.[HOW]When this happens, call ASSERT(), and return a zero instead.This fixes an OVERRUN and an NEGATIVE_RETURNS issues reported by Coverity.
